response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth, far exceeding its tangible value. I believe it could be a remarkable addition to your collection or serve a purpose that brings unparalleled benefits to your life. Given its rarity and the impact it has had on those who have come before you, I am extending this exclusive offer to you for a price of $500,000. Should you choose to accept, this investment will not only secure a piece of history but also potentially appreciate in value over time. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 500000}
